dynamic_line: I was a charlatan; a scammer. I could sweet-talk my way out of anything, and swindle anyone of their things. I rigged bets, ran slight-of-hand schemes; heck, I even learned a bit of alchemy, and sold my watered-down potions as 'elixirs of eternal life' and all that shit. When one place went bad, I packed up and moved on to the next big city.

Well, my luck ran out. The city guard arrested me, and I was tried for innumerable counts of fraud. Fourtunatley, I had bribed the law beforehand, and I got off easy. I quit that life, and moved on. But hey, I got rich as hell from it!
